front.title: Considerations for Benchmarking Link-State IGP Data Plane Route Convergence

abstract.t: This document discusses considerations for benchmarking Interior Gateway Protocol (IGP) Route Convergence for any link-state IGP, such as Intermediate System-Intermediate System (ISIS) and Open-Shorted Path first (OSPF). A companion methodology document is to be used for benchmarking IGP convergence time through externally observable (black box) data plane measurements. A companion terminology document is to be referenced to support the benchmarking.
